wxextension Main Page

v0.9.7

This is a public source code library containing a collection of wxWidgets extension classes.

It uses wxWidgets 2.9.1 and STL classes.

There are also some classes to support database programming using the Oracle and ODBC Template Library.

For building instruction see sdp.
